message: Hi Bob, thanks for your interest in the product.  I'm happy to start the conversation at $1,600,000.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I'm looking to save as much as I can. I'm willing to pay $1,200,000 for the product. Can you consider my offer?
Bob, thanks for the offer. I understand you're looking for a good deal, and I want to make this work for both of us. How about we meet in the middle at $1,400,000?
I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but I'm still looking to save some more. I'm willing to pay $1,300,000 for the product. Can you consider my offer?
Bob, I appreciate your persistence.  I'm willing to come down slightly to $1,375,000. This is my final offer.
I understand this is your final offer, but I'm still trying to stay within my budget. I'm willing to pay $1,350,000 for the product. Can you reconsider?
